title: As Seen on Rover
desc: Trusted by Miami locals. Pet owners and hotel concierge recommend Pupbestie to their friends and hotel guests for the loving, dependable, trustworthy petcare on Miami Beach. Local and visitng pet owners, hotel concierge count on Pupbestie.

items.name: Amanda K.
items.review: Christine was great! I will be using her Tuesday and Thursdays. Highly recommended.

items.name: Peter D.
items.review: Christine instantly connected with our pup, made him comfortable and happy while we were out. Came back to a very happy dog every time. Christine is prompt and friendly and a natural with dogs! Highly recommend.

items.name: William D.
items.review: Christine was fantastic! Very caring friendly! Took Mercer on multiple adventures throughout the day. Will Defintely use Christine again and refer her to my friends.

items.name: Cate B.
items.review: Christine was so great! We used her multiple times while visiting Miami and Stella grew to love her. Would HIGHLY recommend to anyone looking for a dog walker or sitter.
